com.googlecode.rockit.app.sampler.old

Class StandardSampler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.rockit.app.sampler.old.AbstractSampler
      • com.googlecode.rockit.app.sampler.old.StandardSampler

  • public class StandardSampler
extends AbstractSampler
    INPUT: - P(events| conditions1, conditions0) List events: variables of the events section (can also be variables without weights) List conditions1: variables which are fixed to 1 (true) List conditions0: variables which are fixed to 0 (false) - NumberOfRounds: Number of sampling rounds - NumberOfWarmupRounds: Number of rounds before the real sampling rounds start. OUTPUT: - File in Sparce Matrix Format 11 37 117 11 12 37 117 (Position number of the variables which equal 1.) (Every line represents one Samplin run)
    Author:
    jan

      • sample

        public double sample()
              throws SolveException,
                     ReadOrWriteToFileException,
                     SQLException,
                     ParseException
        Description copied from class: AbstractSampler
        This method performs the sampling steps. It returns the double value (between 0 and 1) which represents the probability that the following (given) statement is true: P(events| conditions1, conditions0)
        Specified by:
        sample in class AbstractSampler
        Returns:
        Throws:
